channel.title: Requesting a Server
channel.description:
Now if u wanna be a jerk to me and make me look stupid, leave NOW Well I was wondering if someone can make me the server bc i tried to and it got all messed up...it means a lot to me bc i want to have a server. Server will be owned by
ME and YOU. Since there is no format for this i will post what i want, please help, it means so much. Thanks
When i say full dragon i mean full dragon with skirt and legs too!
Starting Equipment Full dragon with dds, fury, rune boots, cooking gauntlets, fury, and rune boots
Starting Stats 135HP 99 Smithing All other stats are 0
Lvling type Fast
Features Dragon smithing NO nulls both magic types work w/o runes Perfect ring (admins and mods only) gives 10k stat bonus to all stats (range def, melee def, etc.) PK everywhere BUT Varrock
NPCs Area Greater Demons (5 please) GDZ (wild) KBD a random dungeon Jad (3 please) Mage Arena (wild) (ALL) barrows brothers Varrock Central
Commands Effect ::prayer gives 1M ourg bones to raise prayer ::range teles u to range guild to range range (hit targets to raise it) ::dragon Gives full dragon with cooking gauntlets, rune boots, fury, and whip ::jad telepots u to Jad ::barrows gives u all barrows ::mime gives u full mime ::rune gives u full rune ::archer gives u karils top and bottom, robin hood set, crystal bow, and fury ::stone gives u (working) ring of stone ::cw teleports u to Castle Wars ::da teleports u to Duel Arena ::gdz teleports u to Greater Demons (wild) ::food gives u 1k Manta Rays ::home teleports u to Varrock (East Bank) ::legends gives legends cape, desert boots, and cooking gauntlets ::king gives full gilded ::switch Switches u to Ancients and vice versa ::bars gives rune and gold bars to smith (gold bars make dragon) ::KBD teleports u to a dungeon with the King Black Dragon ::maxme (Admin and mod only) gives u max lvl on all stats (135 on all CMB stats, 99 on non-cmb stats)
Shops NPC Owners Items Barrows Outlets Horvik All barrows sets (1000 of each set in stock) Magic Outlet Zaff Full Infinity, full ghostly robes, ALL mystic full sets, full enchanted, ALL 3 mage books, and ancient staff Dragon Outlet Vanaka Full dragon, dds, dscimmy, dragon spear (kp), dlong, dragon battleax, and dragon 2H Amulet Outlet Betty Fury, glory, str ammy, def ammy, and magic ammy Range Outlet Brian Arrow set (Rune-Bronze) (10,000 of each arrow), full karils, bolt racks, full blk d hide, crystal bow, mage shortbow, and robin hood set.
Rare Outlet Santa Phat set, mask set, santa, half wine, easter, pumpkin, and disk of returning Rune Outlet Aubury Fires, waters, airs, earths, chaos, deaths, laws, and nature runes. (10k of each rune in stock) Melee Outlet Lowe Full rune, ALL rune trimmed armors, ALL god capes, and whip General Outlet Wizard Mizgog Rune boots, ALL gloves, ALL boots, and legends cape
Ive tried to make my own server and failed so many times, i want a Hamachi server and i was wondering if u wanted to make it your own server but just make me admin for 1 reason, i made the layout of it. If u want to help me, help me, if u want to make ur server use this, its a great idea i think and i think it will be a success. REMEBER I AM ASKING FOR HELP! Not being lazy bc i have tried SEVERAL times to make my own server but it never works out.

item.title: Requesting a Server
item.dc:creator: @double_helix double helix
item.description:
@double_helix wrote:

I wont be making your server, but I am just asking: is this the kind of server people are looking for? Is that what they really want?

Im a hoster and coder myself - but Im always looking for something completely new to put in my server. And what you have told me is… what every server has and where I (personally) say: “meh… nothing new… wheres the fun…”

PS: Most codes already have these stuff tho.

}{}{

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting a Server
item.dc:creator: @aviator aviator
item.description:
@aviator wrote:

what are u having trouble with? like error wise when u try to make your own

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting a Server
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

Now if u wanna be a jerk to me and make me look stupid, leave NOW
Well I was wondering if someone can make me the server bc i tried to and it got all messed up…it means a lot to me bc i want to have a server. Server will be owned by

ME and YOU. Since there is no format for this i will post what i want, please help, it means so much. Thanks

When i say full dragon i mean full dragon with skirt and legs too!

Starting Equipment
Full dragon with dds, fury, rune boots, cooking gauntlets, fury, and rune boots

Starting Stats
135HP
99 Smithing
All other stats are 0

Lvling type
Fast

Features
Dragon smithing
NO nulls
both magic types work w/o runes
Perfect ring (admins and mods only) gives 10k stat bonus to all stats (range def, melee def, etc.)
PK everywhere BUT Varrock

NPCs Area
Greater Demons (5 please) GDZ (wild)
KBD a random dungeon
Jad (3 please) Mage Arena (wild)
(ALL) barrows brothers Varrock Central

Commands Effect
::prayer gives 1M ourg bones to raise prayer
::range teles u to range guild to range range (hit targets to raise it)
::dragon Gives full dragon with cooking gauntlets, rune boots, fury, and whip
::jad telepots u to Jad
::barrows gives u all barrows
::mime gives u full mime
::rune gives u full rune
::archer gives u karils top and bottom, robin hood set, crystal bow, and fury
::stone gives u (working) ring of stone
::cw teleports u to Castle Wars
::da teleports u to Duel Arena
::gdz teleports u to Greater Demons (wild)
::food gives u 1k Manta Rays
::home teleports u to Varrock (East Bank)
::legends gives legends cape, desert boots, and cooking gauntlets
::king gives full gilded
::switch Switches u to Ancients and vice versa
::bars gives rune and gold bars to smith (gold bars make dragon)
::KBD teleports u to a dungeon with the King Black Dragon
::maxme (Admin and mod only) gives u max lvl on all stats (135 on all CMB stats, 99 on non-cmb stats)

Shops NPC Owners Items
Barrows Outlets Horvik All barrows sets (1000 of each set in stock)
Magic Outlet Zaff Full Infinity, full ghostly robes, ALL mystic
full sets, full enchanted, ALL 3 mage books,
and ancient staff
Dragon Outlet Vanaka Full dragon, dds, dscimmy, dragon spear (kp),
dlong, dragon battleax, and dragon 2H
Amulet Outlet Betty Fury, glory, str ammy, def ammy, and magic ammy
Range Outlet Brian Arrow set (Rune-Bronze) (10,000 of each
arrow), full karils, bolt racks, full blk d hide, crystal
bow, mage shortbow, and robin hood set.

Rare Outlet Santa Phat set, mask set, santa, half wine, easter,
pumpkin, and disk of returning
Rune Outlet Aubury Fires, waters, airs, earths, chaos, deaths, laws,
and nature runes. (10k of each rune in stock)
Melee Outlet Lowe Full rune, ALL rune trimmed armors, ALL god
capes, and whip
General Outlet Wizard Mizgog Rune boots, ALL gloves, ALL boots, and legends cape

Ive tried to make my own server and failed so many times, i want a Hamachi server and i was wondering if u wanted to make it your own server but just make me admin for 1 reason, i made the layout of it. If u want to help me, help me, if u want to make ur server use this, its a great idea i think and i think it will be a success. REMEBER I AM ASKING FOR HELP! Not being lazy bc i have tried SEVERAL times to make my own server but it never works out.
